# include "samples/TrigInDetValidation_bjet_sample1.xml"

exeName TIDArdict.exe
exeParamString TIDAdata11-rtt.dat -f data-bjet-pileup-merging.root -b Test_bin.dat

exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe

exeName TIDAcomparitor.exe
